data.benefits: Scheme provides 50% financial support or maximum Rs.50 lakh for setting up Effluent Treatment Plant (ETP).
data.eligibility: All new units for setting up of Effluent Treatment Plant and for installation of Air Pollution Control Devices are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. The unit should have filed Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM). 
  2. The unit should have obtained No objection certificate from Competent Authority if applicable. 
  3. The unit should be in commercial and regular production.
data.beneficiaries: All new units for setting up of Effluent Treatment Plant and for installation of Air Pollution Control Devices are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. The unit should have filed Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM). 
  2. The unit should have obtained No objection certificate from Competent Authority if applicable. 
  3. The unit should be in commercial and regular production.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context: Industrial development and associated growth should be necessarily carried out in a manner wherein no damage is done to the ecology and to the environment as a whole.
data.objective: The objective of the scheme is to implement the concept of ‘Zero Effect’.
data.description:
1. Scheme provides 50% financial support or maximum Rs.50 lakh for setting up Effluent Treatment Plant (ETP) and Air Pollution Control Devices for new MSMEs. 
  2. Units adopting zero effluent discharge (certified by HSPCB) and reusing treated wastewater eligible for higher benefit. Higher benefit of up to 75% of capital cost, with a maximum of Rs.100 lakhs.
data.how_to_apply:
Application in the form as per Annexure-I in the scheme document along with listed documents has to be submitted to the Director/ Director General of MSMEs, on the web portal of the department within 3 months of date of installation or from the date of notification of the scheme, whichever is later. 

Annexure-I: https://cdnbbsr.s3waas.gov.in/s3f48c04ffab49ff0e5d1176244fdfb65c/uploads/2022/06/2022060279-1.pdf
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefits within 7 days from the sanction of application from the concerned authority.
data.additional_info:
Link of list of Restrictive Industries in Haryana: https://www.hsiidc.org.in/uploads/estate_managements/170097742718HEEP%20restrictive%20list.pdf 

Categorization of Blocks : https://investharyana.in/content/pdfs/Re-categorization%20of%20blocks%2015.11.2018.pdf
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM)
NOC/CLU (No Objection Certificate/Change of Land Use)
Haryana Resident Certificate (for local employment benefits)
ESI/PF Registration Number
Proof of Commercial Production
Financial Statements (Balance Sheet, Profit & Loss Statement)
Import-Exporter Code (IEC)
Registration-cum-Membership Certificate (RCMC) from Export Promotion Council
Land Documents (ownership or lease agreement)
Environmental Clearances (if applicable)
Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) Certification
Proof of Investment (in machinery/equipment)
Electricity Bills (for electricity-related incentives)
Energy Audit Report (for energy efficiency claims)
Other Miscellaneous Documents (as per specific schemes)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address :  Sh. Deepak Burak , Directorate of MSME
Phone No: 8699888828

data.beneficiary: Manufacturing Industry - All Entities - Haryana - All MSMEs
